general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. Cover the rows with dry leaves in sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect.

advisory: Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are critical. Avoid water deficit during these stages.
Cover rows with dry leaves. Top-dress with potassium. Irrigate frequently during hot months.
High temperatures increase water requirement. Irrigate the crop.
High temperatures may lead to wilting. Apply Streptocyclin in root zone.
Install pheromone trap for shoot and fruit borer management.
Mulch coconut leaves around the tree to reduce water loss.
Cover newly planted seedlings with paper caps during daytime.
Harvest fingerlings from shallow ponds if water temperature rises. Ensure enough water depth in the pond.
Check migration of caterpillars. Dust with Chlorpyriphos around the field.
Check migration of caterpillars. Dust with Chlorpyriphos around the field.
Cut tops of onion after harvesting. Dry bulbs in well-ventilated room.
Spray Imidacloprid or Thiamethoxam for mango hopper control.
Treat okra seeds with Imidacloprid before sowing. Install yellow sticky traps.
